title: Velocity
description: In the shadowed streets of Archer City, Havoc rises. Once a bustling metropolis, Archer City is now a frozen wasteland and is being held under siege from within. Severed from the outside world, all hope of rescue or supplies is lost.After the harrowing events at the school, Nathan’s life is thrown into chaos. His sister has been snatched away and it is uncertain if she still lives. His parents vanished without a trace and Sam is nowhere to be found. Nathan and the others with superpowers are the last glimmer of hope to reclaim the city’s freedom, but they are hunted and feared by those without powers.Battle lines are drawn through the heart of Archer City as factions form.As the city teeters on the brink of collapse, will Nathan and his friends survive long enough to fight back and win the city's freedom again? Or will the dark powers consume them all?
author: R.L.  Harris
